title: On which topic or subject do you want to write a book? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can definitely tell you what I DON'T want to write. I don't want to write a book which revolves around cliched romance, self help books are big no no for me, for, I think people are surrounded with opinions and I don't want to flood them with 'Gyaan'.

I suggest you write a book you have personal knowledge or knowledge you obtained from research. I wrote the book “The Lost Dutchmen Mine and Peg Leg Pete Mine” (amazon.com). It took five years of research and sorting though the lies related to the Lost Dutchman Mine to write the book. Three years after I published the book found another lie I had missed. For further information about :The Lost Dutchmen Mine and Peg Leg Pete Mine go to my website haroldcohn.com. Harold
